name: SpeedBike X1
detail: Ideal for quick and small parcel deliveries within the city. Best for urgent document or food deliveries.

name: UrbanVan Pro
detail: Perfect for medium-sized shipments, furniture, and bulk grocery deliveries across urban areas.

name: ScootEase 500
detail: Efficient for small package deliveries, medical supplies, or local courier services.

name: CityCruise Sedan
detail: Best for business travel, premium parcel services, and intercity document deliveries.

name: SkySwift Drone
detail: Perfect for lightweight, high-speed deliveries like e-commerce, medical supplies, and small urgent packages.

name: FreightMaster Truck
detail: Designed for heavy goods transportation, industrial shipments, and bulk logistics.

name: AeroLift Helicopter
detail: Used for emergency cargo transport, VIP logistics, and high-priority deliveries.
